subject: Indianapolis 500 (Auto Race)
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Stanton Barrett, a Hollywood stuntman with more than 200 films and television series to his credit, and probably as many broken bones, torn muscles and assorted injuries, is trying to prove himself on auto racing’s biggest stage as a rookie at the Indianapolis 500. “I’ve never experienced something like this,” Barrett said Tuesday at the start of the two-day Indy rookie tests.
